00040 /**
00041  * @file
00042  *

00045  * <hr>$Revision: 100176 $<hr>
00046  */

00048 #ifndef __CVMX_ZIP_H__
00049 #define __CVMX_ZIP_H__
00050

00053 extern "C" {

00056 
00057 typedef union {
00058     uint64_t u64;
00059     struct {
00060 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00061         uint64_t unused:5;
00062         uint64_t full_block_write:1;
00063         uint64_t no_l2_alloc:1;
00064         uint64_t little_endian:1;
00065         uint64_t length:16;
00066         uint64_t ptr:40;
00067 #else
00068         uint64_t ptr:40;
00069         uint64_t length:16;
00070         uint64_t little_endian:1;
00071         uint64_t no_l2_alloc:1;
00072         uint64_t full_block_write:1;
00073         uint64_t unused:5;
00074 #endif
00075     } s;
00076     struct {
00077 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00078         uint64_t length:16;
00079         uint64_t full_block_write:1;
00080         uint64_t no_l2_alloc:1;
00081         uint64_t little_endian:1;
00082         uint64_t unused:3;
00083         uint64_t ptr:42;
00084 #else
00085         uint64_t ptr:42;
00086         uint64_t unused:3;
00087         uint64_t little_endian:1;
00088         uint64_t no_l2_alloc:1;
00089         uint64_t full_block_write:1;
00090         uint64_t length:16;
00091 #endif
00092     } zip3;
00093 } cvmx_zip_ptr_t;
00094 #define CVMX_ZIP_PTR_MAX_LEN    ((1 << 16) - 1)
00095 
00096 typedef enum {
00097     CVMX_ZIP_COMPLETION_NOTDONE = 0,
00098     CVMX_ZIP_COMPLETION_SUCCESS = 1,
00099     CVMX_ZIP_COMPLETION_OTRUNC = 2,
00100     CVMX_ZIP_COMPLETION_STOP = 3,
00101     CVMX_ZIP_COMPLETION_ITRUNC = 4,
00102     CVMX_ZIP_COMPLETION_RBLOCK = 5,
00103     CVMX_ZIP_COMPLETION_NLEN = 6,
00104     CVMX_ZIP_COMPLETION_BADCODE = 7,
00105     CVMX_ZIP_COMPLETION_BADCODE2 = 8,
00106     CVMX_ZIP_COMPLETION_ZERO_LEN = 9,
00107     CVMX_ZIP_COMPLETION_PARITY = 10,
00108     CVMX_ZIP_COMPLETION_FATAL = 11
00109 } cvmx_zip_completion_code_t;
00110 
00111 typedef union {
00112     uint64_t u64[3];
00113     struct {
00114 
00115         // WORD 0
00116 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00117         uint64_t crc32:32;
00118         uint64_t adler:32;
00119 #else
00120         uint64_t adler:32;
00121         uint64_t crc32:32;
00122 #endif
00123 
00124         // WORD 1
00125 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00126         uint64_t totalbyteswritten:32;
00127         uint64_t totalbytesread:32;
00128 #else
00129         uint64_t totalbytesread:32;
00130         uint64_t totalbyteswritten:32;
00131 #endif
00132 
00133         // WORD 2
00134 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00135         uint64_t totalbitsprocessed:32; // decompression only
00136         uint64_t unused20:5;
00137         uint64_t exnum:3;   // compression only
00138         uint64_t unused21:1;
00139         uint64_t exbits:7;  // compression only
00140         uint64_t unused22:7;
00141         uint64_t eof:1; // decompression only
00142         cvmx_zip_completion_code_t completioncode:8;    // If polling, SW should set this to zero and wait for non-zero
00143 #else
00144         cvmx_zip_completion_code_t completioncode:8;    // If polling, SW should set this to zero and wait for non-zero
00145         uint64_t eof:1; // decompression only
00146         uint64_t unused22:7;
00147         uint64_t exbits:7;  // compression only
00148         uint64_t unused21:1;
00149         uint64_t exnum:3;   // compression only
00150         uint64_t unused20:5;
00151         uint64_t totalbitsprocessed:32; // decompression only
00152 #endif
00153     } s;
00154 } cvmx_zip_result_t;
00155 
00156 typedef union {
00157     uint64_t u64[8];
00158     struct {
00159 
00160         // WORD 0
00161 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00162         uint64_t unused00:8;
00163         uint64_t totaloutputlength:24;
00164         uint64_t unused01:5;
00165         uint64_t exnum:3;
00166         uint64_t unused02:1;
00167         uint64_t exbits:7;
00168         uint64_t unused03:4;
00169         uint64_t flush:1;
00170         uint64_t speed:2;
00171         uint64_t forcefixed:1;
00172         uint64_t forcedynamic:1;
00173         uint64_t eof:1;
00174         uint64_t bof:1;
00175         uint64_t compress:1;
00176         uint64_t unused04:1;
00177         uint64_t dscatter:1;
00178         uint64_t dgather:1;
00179         uint64_t hgather:1;
00180 #else
00181         uint64_t hgather:1;
00182         uint64_t dgather:1;
00183         uint64_t dscatter:1;
00184         uint64_t unused04:1;
00185         uint64_t compress:1;
00186         uint64_t bof:1;
00187         uint64_t eof:1;
00188         uint64_t forcedynamic:1;
00189         uint64_t forcefixed:1;
00190         uint64_t speed:2;
00191         uint64_t flush:1;
00192         uint64_t unused03:4;
00193         uint64_t exbits:7;
00194         uint64_t unused02:1;
00195         uint64_t exnum:3;
00196         uint64_t unused01:5;
00197         uint64_t totaloutputlength:24;
00198         uint64_t unused00:8;
00199 #endif
00200 
00201         // WORD 1
00202 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00203         uint64_t historylength:16;
00204         uint64_t unused10:16;
00205         uint64_t adler32:32;
00206 #else
00207         uint64_t adler32:32;
00208         uint64_t unused10:16;
00209         uint64_t historylength:16;
00210 #endif
00211 
00212         // WORD 2
00213         cvmx_zip_ptr_t ctx_ptr;
00214 
00215         // WORD 3
00216         cvmx_zip_ptr_t hist_ptr;
00217 
00218         // WORD 4
00219         cvmx_zip_ptr_t in_ptr;
00220 
00221         // WORD 5
00222         cvmx_zip_ptr_t out_ptr;
00223 
00224         // WORD 6
00225         cvmx_zip_ptr_t result_ptr;
00226 
00227         // WORD 7
00228         /** NOTE: "wq_ptr" has been superceded by the union below
00229          * Please use the cvmx_zptr_set_wqe() accessor
00230          * to program a work entry into a command.
00231          */
00232         union {
00233             uint64_t u64;
00234             struct {
00235 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00236             uint64_t rsvd_62_63:2;
00237             /** CN78XX: if 'wq[' != 0, SSO Global GRP field */
00238             uint64_t xgrp:10;
00239             /** CN78XX: if 'wq[' != 0, SSO Tag Type field */
00240             uint64_t tag_type:2;
00241             uint64_t rsvd_42_49:8;
00242             /**
00243             If 'wqp' is non-zero, it is a physical address
00244             of a work-queue entry that the ZIP coprocessor
00245             submits to SSO after completing the invocation
00246             and writing all results (IWORD5 and IWORD6) to memory. 
00247             */
00248             uint64_t wqp:42;
00249 #else
00250             uint64_t wqp:42;
00251             uint64_t rsvd_42_49:8;
00252             uint64_t tag_type:2;
00253             uint64_t xgrp:10;
00254             uint64_t rsvd_62_63:2;
00255 #endif
00256             };
00257         } zip_wqe;
00258     } s;
00259 } cvmx_zip_command_t;
00260 
00261 typedef struct
00262 {
00263     cvmx_fpa_pool_config_t zip_pool;
00264     int            aura;
00265 }cvmx_zip_config_t;
00266 
00267 extern CVMX_SHARED cvmx_zip_config_t zip_config;
00268 
00269 static inline int64_t cvmx_fpa_get_zip_pool(void)
00270 {
00271     return (zip_config.zip_pool.pool_num);
00272 }
00273 
00274 static inline uint64_t cvmx_fpa_get_zip_pool_block_size(void)
00275 {
00276     return (zip_config.zip_pool.buffer_size);
00277 }
00278 
00279 static inline uint64_t cvmx_fpa_get_zip_aura(void)
00280 {
00281     return (zip_config.aura);
00282 }

00284 /**
00285  * Sets the internal FPA pool data structure for ZIP pool.
00286  * @param pool  fpa pool number yo use
00287  * @param buffer_size   buffer size of pool
00288  * @param buffer_count  number of buufers to allocate to pool
00289  */
00290 
00291 void cvmx_zip_set_fpa_pool_config(int64_t pool, uint64_t buffer_size,
00292                        uint64_t buffer_count);

00294 /**
00295  * Gets the internal FPA pool data structure for zip pool.
00296  * @param zip_pool pointer to timer fpa pool structure where data gets copied
00297  */
00298 void cvmx_zip_get_fpa_pool_config(cvmx_fpa_pool_config_t *zip_pool);

00300 /**
00301  * Initialize the ZIP block
00302  *
00303  * @return Zero on success, negative on failure
00304  */
00305 int cvmx_zip_initialize(void);
00306 
00307 /**
00308  * Initialize the ZIP QUEUE buffer
00309  *
00310  * @param queue : ZIP instruction queue
00311  * @param zcoremask : ZIP coremask to use for this queue
00312  *
00313  * @return Zero on success, negative on failure
00314  */
00315 int cvmx_zip_queue_initialize(int queue, int zcoremask);
00316 
00317 /**
00318  * @INTERNAL
00319  * Initialize the ZIP queue buffer and zip block.
00320  *
00321  * @param queue : ZIP instruction queue
00322  * @param zcoremask : ZIP coremask to use for this queue
00323  *
00324  * @return Zero on success, negative on failure
00325  */
00326 int cvmx_zip3_init(int queue, int zcoremask);
00327 
00328 /**
00329  * Shutdown the ZIP block. ZIP must be idle when
00330  * this function is called.
00331  *
00332  * @return Zero on success, negative on failure
00333  */
00334 int cvmx_zip_shutdown(void);
00335 
00336 /**
00337  * Shutdown the ZIP block for a queue. ZIP must be idle when
00338  * this function is called.
00339  *
00340  * @param queue   Zip instruction queue of the command
00341  *
00342  * @return Zero on success, negative on failure
00343  */
00344 int cvmx_zip_queue_shutdown(int queue);
00345 
00346 /**
00347  * Submit a command to the ZIP block
00348  *
00349  * @param command Zip command to submit
00350  *
00351  * @return Zero on success, negative on failure
00352  */
00353 int cvmx_zip_submit(cvmx_zip_command_t * command);
00354 
00355 /**
00356  * Submit a command to the ZIP block
00357  *
00358  * @param command Zip command to submit
00359  * @param queue   Zip instruction queue of the command
00360  *
00361  * @return Zero on success, negative on failure
00362  */
00363 int cvmx_zip_queue_submit(cvmx_zip_command_t * command, int queue);

00367 static inline void cvmx_zptr_set_ptr(cvmx_zip_ptr_t *zptr, uint64_t ptr)
00368 {
00369     if (octeon_has_feature(OCTEON_FEATURE_ZIP3))
00370         zptr->zip3.ptr = ptr;
00371     else
00372         zptr->s.ptr = ptr;
00373 }
00374 
00375 static inline uint64_t cvmx_zptr_get_ptr(cvmx_zip_ptr_t *zptr)
00376 {
00377     uint64_t    ptr;
00378 
00379     if (octeon_has_feature(OCTEON_FEATURE_ZIP3))
00380         ptr = zptr->zip3.ptr;
00381     else
00382         ptr = zptr->s.ptr;
00383 
00384     return ptr;
00385 }
00386 
00387 static inline void cvmx_zptr_set_len(cvmx_zip_ptr_t *zptr, int len)
00388 {
00389     if (octeon_has_feature(OCTEON_FEATURE_ZIP3))
00390         zptr->zip3.length = len;
00391     else
00392         zptr->s.length = len;
00393 }
00394 
00395 static inline int cvmx_zptr_get_len(cvmx_zip_ptr_t *zptr)
00396 {
00397     int len;
00398 
00399     if (octeon_has_feature(OCTEON_FEATURE_ZIP3))
00400         len = zptr->zip3.length;
00401     else
00402         len = zptr->s.length;
00403 
00404     return len;
00405 }

00407 static inline void cvmx_zptr_set_fbw(cvmx_zip_ptr_t *zptr, int fbw)
00408 {
00409     if (octeon_has_feature(OCTEON_FEATURE_ZIP3))
00410         zptr->zip3.full_block_write = fbw;
00411     else
00412         zptr->s.full_block_write = fbw;
00413 }
00414 
00415 static inline int cvmx_zptr_get_fbw(cvmx_zip_ptr_t *zptr)
00416 {
00417     int fbw;
00418 
00419     if (octeon_has_feature(OCTEON_FEATURE_ZIP3))
00420         fbw = zptr->zip3.full_block_write;
00421     else
00422         fbw = zptr->s.full_block_write;
00423 
00424     return fbw;
00425 }

00427 #include "cvmx-wqe.h"
00428 
00429 /**
00430  * Assign a Work-Queue entry for ZIP operation completion notification
00431  *
00432  */
00433 static inline void cvmx_zptr_set_wqe(cvmx_zip_command_t *zcmd, cvmx_wqe_t *wqp)
00434 {
00435 
00436     zcmd->s.zip_wqe.u64 = 0;
00437 
00438     if (octeon_has_feature(OCTEON_FEATURE_ZIP3)) {
00439         zcmd->s.zip_wqe.tag_type = wqp->word1.cn78xx.tag_type;
00440         zcmd->s.zip_wqe.xgrp = wqp->word1.cn78xx.grp;
00441     }
00442 
00443     zcmd->s.zip_wqe.wqp = cvmx_ptr_to_phys(wqp);
00444 }
